QuestData.Title: You Have to Burn the Ropes
QuestData.Description: I, umm... well...$b$bOh, never mind. It was a stupid idea.$b$bIt's just that, I was thinking that maybe we can stop the Kunzen hozen from attacking us without having to, you know... KILL anything. I noticed a few ropes on the side of the mountain. I think they're using them to climb down to our farms and...$b$bNo, forget it. It was a silly idea anyways.
